original_text: Paul had said, ‘God caused that man to live again.’ When the people heard this, some of them laughed at him. But other people said to Paul, ‘We want you to tell us more about this on another day.’
korean_text: 그들이 죽은 자의 부활을 듣고 어떤 사람은 조롱도 하고 어떤 사람은 이 일에 대하여 네 말을 다시 듣겠다 하니

sentences.original_text: ‘God caused that man to live again.’
some of them laughed at him.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 어떤 이들은 그를 비웃었다.

sentences.original_text: But other people said to Paul,
‘We want you to tell us more about this
sentences.korean_translation: ‘우리는 당신이 이것에 대해 더 알려주길 원합니다
